name: eddy
author: Jesper Andersson (University of Oxford)
description: A tool for correcting eddy currents and movements in diffusion data

inputs.name: implementation
inputs.description: Choose the implementation to use

inputs.name: imain
inputs.description: File containing all the images to estimate distortions for

inputs.name: mask
inputs.description: Mask to indicate brain

inputs.name: index
inputs.description: File containing indices for all volumes in --imain into --acqp and --topup

inputs.name: acqp
inputs.description: File containing acquisition parameters

inputs.name: bvecs
inputs.description: File containing the b-vectors for all volumes in --imain

inputs.name: bvals
inputs.description: File containing the b-values for all volumes in --imain

inputs.name: out
inputs.description: Basename for output

inputs.name: mb
inputs.description: Multi-band factor

inputs.name: mb_offs
inputs.description: Multi-band offset (-1 if bottom slice removed, 1 if top slice removed)

inputs.name: slspec
inputs.description: Name of text file completely specifying slice/group acuistion. N.B. --slspec and --json are mutually exclusive.

inputs.name: json
inputs.description: Name of .json text file with information about slice timing. N.B. --json and --slspec are mutually exclusive.

inputs.name: mporder
inputs.description: Order of slice-to-vol movement model (default 0, i.e. vol-to-vol

inputs.name: s2v_lambda
inputs.description: Regularisation weight for slice-to-vol movement. (default 1, reasonable range 1--10)

inputs.name: topup
inputs.description: Base name for output files from topup

inputs.name: field
inputs.description: Name of file with susceptibility field (in Hz)

inputs.name: field_mat
inputs.description: Name of rigid body transform for susceptibility field

inputs.name: flm
inputs.description: First level EC model (movement/linear/quadratic/cubic, default quadratic)

inputs.name: slm
inputs.description: Second level EC model (none/linear/quadratic, default none)

inputs.name: fwhm
inputs.description: FWHM for conditioning filter when estimating the parameters (default 0)

inputs.name: niter
inputs.description: Number of iterations (default 5)

inputs.name: s2v_niter
inputs.description: Number of iterations for slice-to-vol (default 5)

inputs.name: cnr_maps
inputs.description: Write shell-wise cnr-maps (default false)

inputs.name: residuals
inputs.description: Write residuals (between GP and observations), (default false)

inputs.name: fep
inputs.description: Fill empty planes in x- or y-directions (default false)

inputs.name: interp
inputs.description: Interpolation model for estimation step (spline/trilinear, default spline)

inputs.name: s2v_interp
inputs.description: Slice-to-vol interpolation model for estimation step (spline/trilinear, default trilinear)

inputs.name: resamp
inputs.description: Final resampling method (jac/lsr, default jac)

inputs.name: nvoxhp
inputs.description: # of voxels used to estimate the hyperparameters (default 1000)

inputs.name: initrand
inputs.description: Seeds rand for when selecting voxels (default 0=no seeding)

inputs.name: ff
inputs.description: Fudge factor for hyperparameter error variance (default 10.0)

inputs.name: repol
inputs.description: Detect and replace outlier slices (default false))

inputs.name: ol_nstd
inputs.description: Number of std off to qualify as outlier (default 4)

inputs.name: ol_nvox
inputs.description: Min # of voxels in a slice for inclusion in outlier detection (default 250)

inputs.name: ol_type
inputs.description: Type of outliers, slicewise (sw), groupwise (gw) or both (both). (default sw)

inputs.name: ol_pos
inputs.description: Consider both positive and negative outliers if set (default false)

inputs.name: ol_sqr
inputs.description: Consider outliers among sums-of-squared differences if set (default false)

inputs.name: estimate_move_by_susceptibility
inputs.description: Estimate how susceptibility field changes with subject movement (default false)

inputs.name: mbs_niter
inputs.description: Number of iterations for MBS estimation (default 10)

inputs.name: mbs_lambda
inputs.description: Weighting of regularisation for MBS estimation (default 10)

inputs.name: mbs_ksp
inputs.description: Knot-spacing for MBS field estimation (default 10mm)

inputs.name: dont_sep_offs_move
inputs.description: Do NOT attempt to separate field offset from subject movement (default false)

inputs.name: dont_peas
inputs.description: Do NOT perform a post-eddy alignment of shells (default false)

inputs.name: data_is_shelled
inputs.description: Assume, don't check, that data is shelled (default false)

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.description: switch on diagnostic messages

output-files.name: out
output-files.description: Output file containing the corrected images
